question: Which of the following clearly defines the word Bus Width?
option1: It is the size of the vehicle used to ship the computer.
option2: It is the number of pins in a computer port.
option3: It is the number of bits that can be sent to a CPU simultaneously.
answer: It is the number of bits that can be sent to a CPU simultaneously.
explanation: The speed of system random-access memory is determined by two factors: bus width and bus speed. Bus width refers to how many bits of information RAM can send to the CPU at the same time.
